messages.author: Mihai Parparita -not on Chrome
messages.text: What will happen when calling chrome.app.window.create('bogusURL.html')? If the provisional load will fail, then you'll never invoke the callback. Would it make sense to also listen for DidFailProvisionalLoad, and invoke the callback with NULL?

messages.author: Mihai Parparita -not on Chrome
messages.text: Nit: add newlines between methods definitions.

messages.author: Mihai Parparita -not on Chrome
messages.text: https://developers.google.com/v8/embed#exceptions makes it sound like they're not needed.

messages.author: jeremya
messages.text:
On 2012/09/28 21:55:34, Mihai Parparita wrote:
> Nit: add newlines between methods definitions.

Done.

messages.author: jeremya
messages.text:
On 2012/09/28 21:55:34, Mihai Parparita wrote:
> What will happen when calling chrome.app.window.create('bogusURL.html')? If the
> provisional load will fail, then you'll never invoke the callback. Would it make
> sense to also listen for DidFailProvisionalLoad, and invoke the callback with
> NULL?

Yep. Done.

messages.author: jeremya
messages.text:
On 2012/09/28 21:55:34, Mihai Parparita wrote:
> https://developers.google.com/v8/embed#exceptions makes it sound like they're
> not needed.

Yeah, since we don't do anything with the result, it seems like it should be fine. Removed.

messages.author: Mihai Parparita -not on Chrome
jeremya
